head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Queens: Guns Seized By The Police

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Queens: Guns Seized By The Police

block.p: A man and woman from Whitestone were arrested Wednesday after police officers seized 30 handguns and an assault rifle from their home, the police said yesterday. Keith Boyer, 45, and Roberta Boyer, 39, both of 148th Street, were charged with criminal possession of a weapon, the police said. Mr. Boyer was also charged with reckless endangerment. The police said they also recovered three silencers and 5,000 rounds of ammunition. Officers searched the home after receiving a 911 call reporting a man with a gun at the location, the police said.
